title: Video-Based Teaching Methodology Design for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pedagogical theories and fundamental classroom management knowledge
context.additional_context: Need for content structured optimally for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze video case studies to derive three instructional strategies applicable to classroom situations.
Learners can develop a video-based lesson design plan (with three or more stages) tailored to a given lesson scenario.
Learners can select appropriate video material utilization strategies according to the rule-example/example-rule model.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
